thread.title: Slidell man arrested in child pornography investigation
thread.title_full: Slidell man arrested in child pornography investigation - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: Written by: FOX8Live.com Staff
title: Slidell man arrested in child pornography investigation
text:
Police say a joint investigation with the Louisiana Attorney General's Office led to the arrest of a man with child pornography on his computer.
Johnathan Golmon is charged with three counts of child pornography. One of the charges involves a child under the age of 13.
Slidell police say several more computers belonging to Golmon are currently being analyzed.
The origin of the photos is still being determined, according to police.
Golmon could face additional charges after the investigation is complete.
